CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter the room . INV explains Warm-up task to MOT while CHI looks around the room
CHI looks down at the floor
CHI bends down and picks up the toy duck
MOT moves the chair near CHI and then walks over to the desk
CHI bends down and picks up the duck
CHI stares down at the duck she is holding
MOT picks up the picture book from the floor
<$=1> MOT walks over to the table with the book
MOT puts the book on the table
MOT pulls out the chair near the table
CHI squeezes the duck and takes two steps forward
CHI looks down at the duck
MOT opens the book on the table and takes a few steps back
CHI comes over to the table
MOT walks around to the side of the table
CHI looks down at the duck
CHI points to the picture of the dog
<$=1> MOT leans over and looks closely at CHI
CHI points to the picture of the dog . CHI looks at the next picture
<$=1> MOT leans over and looks closely at CHI
CHI puts her hand on the book

<aft> CHI turns to look at MOT
<bef> MOT holds the book open briefly . MOT points to a picture in book

<2> MOT points to the picture of kitty

CHI pushes the clown into the jack+in+the+box
MOT still points at book and looks at CHI

<bef> CHI takes a few steps back

MOT motions as if she is going to turn the page

MOT pulls CHI's hand away . <aft> MOT turns the page

most of MOT not in camera view

MOT takes a few steps backwards

MOT sits down in the chair
CHI looks up at the ceiling

<aft> CHI walks over to the jack+in+the+box . CHI pulls the clown up
MOT mostly out of camera view
CHI looks around on the floor

CHI puts the crayon in the mouth of the duck
CHI starts to put the crayon in the duck's mouth
<bef> CHI takes the crayon away from the duck . CHI starts to put the crayon back in the duck's mouth
CHI tries to put the crayon in the duck's mouth
CHI pushes the jack+in+the+box down with the crayon she is holding
CHI squats down next to the jack+in+the+box
CHI points to the clown's eyes with the crayon the stands up
CHI starts to close the lid of the jack+in+the+box without pushing the clown down
CHI pushes down on the clown

CHI looks at the duck in her other hand
CHI drops the duck on the floor then continues to push the clown
CHI lets go of the clown

CHI pushes the cover down and goes to turn the handle

<bef> MOT looks up at the camera then at CHI <4> MOT opens her hands
CHI hands ball to MOT forcefully
CHI claps and walks to the waste basket
CHI goes over to the wastebasket
CHI looks into the waste basket
CHI looks away then back in the wastebasket
CHI walks towards the table and chairs
CHI looks down at the floor
the camera moves following CHI and makes a lot of noise
CHI pats the chair with her hand

MOT puts CHI in the chair
MOT sits down near the door
CHI points to the picture then turns to look at MOT
INV explains Small Scale Activity to MOT
INV sets CHI up at the table and takes away the toys from warm-up
<aft> INV leaves the room while Small Scale Activity takes place
INV re-enters and explains the Forbidden Object task to MOT and has her sit next to CHI at the table INV gives CHI the beads to hold . CHI sucks on the beads and watches INVl
INV takes out the Forbidden Object and places on the table
CHI stares at the Forbidden Object
INV sets the object in motion
CHI reaches to touch the object
CHI reaches with her other hand
CHI puts her hands on the table
CHI has the beads hanging from her mouth as she stares at the object
CHI stares at the object with the beads hanging from her mouth
CHI looks at the object and reaches out to MOT
CHI takes her hand off of MOT and touches the beads in her mouth
CHI stuffs the beads further in her mouth
INV puts the Forbidden Object away
INV tells MOT about Parent Child Interaction Boxes . INV picks up the toys from the Small Scale Activity . MOT walks over to the desk and CHI unfastens the strap around her waist and watches MOT
CHI gets down from the chair
CHI stares up at the ball
MOT and the ball are off screen

MOT catches the ball and claps her hands
MOT gives the ball to CHI

CHI looks down at the floor
CHI throws the ball at MOT
the ball bounces off MOT and rolls into the corner
CHI runs after the ball and picks it up
CHI runs excitedly with the ball
CHI comes over with the ball
CHI looks down at the floor

<$=2> MOT catches the ball and holds it still watching CHI
CHI looks down at her legs
CHI watches the ball roll to her
CHI rolls the ball back to MOT

the ball hits CHI's foot and stops
MOT hits the ball so it rolls to CHI
CHI rolls the ball to MOT
CHI moves her feet to catch the ball but she misses
CHI leans forward to get the ball
MOT rolls the ball back to CHI
<bef> CHI rolls the ball to MOT
<$=1> MOT holds the ball and looks at CHI

CHI throws the ball to MOT

CHI grabs the ball then lays on top of it
CHI looks down at the floor
CHI lies over the ball obscuring it from view
CHI gets up holding the ball
MOT holds her hands out and looks at CHI
CHI crawls close to MOT then drops it on the floor in front of her
CHI looks down at the ball
MOT throws the ball up in the air
<$=2> MOT grabs CHI and tries to pull her up
CHI turns to looks at MOT
CHI resists MOT but stands up
MOT looks up at the desk
CHI walks over to the table

MOT and CHI out of camera view
<bef> MOT takes a few steps backwards

MOT squats and holds the towel up to her face

the towel fell off the CHI's head

<$=1> MOT looks at CHI and holds the towel out
<aft> CHI walks out of camera view

MOT and CHI are off the screen near the table

MOT puts the paper on the table then gives CHI a crayon and puts CHI in the chair
CHI looks down at the crayon
MOT pushes CHI's chair into the table then walks over to the desk
MOT holds another crayon in front of CHI
CHI takes the crayon and gives MOT the other one
CHI looks up at MOT briefly
MOT watches CHI from out of camera view
MOT takes the crayon from CHI and begins to draw

<2> MOT points to the drawing with the crayon
CHI stares at the back of her hand
CHI takes the crayon from MOT and starts to draw
CHI holds the crayon above that paper and looks down at it
MOT goes out of camera view
